title: CrashLanding的僵尸意识MOD
txt_content:
RT，我在玩CrashLanding时的僵尸意识ＭＯＤ不知道出了什么问题，虽然加载了，但是没有效果。。。
附图。。。求助。。。
这是配置文件

replies.txt_content:
Features
# Configuration file

####################
# zombie awareness: features
####################

"zombie awareness: features" {
    B:awareness_Light=true
    B:awareness_Scent=false
    B:awareness_Sound=true
    B:extraSpawningCave=false
    B:extraSpawningSurface=false
    B:noisyPistons=true
    B:noisyZombies=true
    B:wanderingHordes=false
}


General
# Configuration file

####################
# zombie awareness: general
####################

"zombie awareness: general" {
    B:awareness_Light_OnlyZombies=false
    B:client_debugRenderSounds=false
    B:client_renderBlood=false
    B:debugConsole=false
    B:debugConsoleOmnipotent=false
    B:debugConsoleSpawns=false
    B:debugConsoleSuperDetailed=false
    I:frequentSoundThreshold=1000
    I:maxPFRange=64
    I:maxPFRangeSense=64
    B:omnipotent=false
    I:scentStrength=60
    B:seeThroughWalls=false
    I:sightRange=16
    I:soundStrength=60
    I:tickRateAILoop=300
    I:tickRatePlayerLoop=600
    I:zombieRandSpeedBoost=5
}

player rules & lists
# Configuration file

####################
# zombie awareness: player rules & lists
####################

"zombie awareness: player rules & lists" {
    S:blacklistAITick=Creeper, Enderman, Wolf
    B:blacklistUsedAITick=true
    B:whiteListUsedOmnipotent=false
    B:whiteListUsedSenses=false
    S:whitelistExtraSpawning=Corosus
    S:whitelistOmnipotentTargettedPlayers=Corosus, SomeDude
    S:whitelistSenses=Corosus, SomeDude
}


spawning
# Configuration file

####################
# zombie awareness: spawning
####################

"zombie awareness: spawning" {
    B:extraSpawningAutoTarget=true
    I:extraSpawningDistMax=32
    I:extraSpawningDistMin=16
    I:extraSpawningMaxCount=15
    I:extraSpawningRandomPool=50
    I:maxZombiesNight=25
    I:maxZombiesNightBaseRarity=100
    I:zombieSpawnTickDelay=600
}



....
